name: Kunming Sunshine Golf Club (昆明阳光高尔夫俱乐部}
courseTitle: Kunming Golf | Best Golf Courses in Kunming, Yunnan

courseDesc.text: Kunming is known as 'the City of Eternal Spring' and paradise for golfing.
An unique natural environment with many courses designed with topography of the terrains.
It offers a more enjoyable golf experience, with sunshine, blue sky, white clouds, lake view, wildness, fun, imagination, quality. excitement and challenge.
Temperature avarages  around  15℃ . (Summer average is around 19℃ and winter is 8℃).

Among all the top 10 golf courses in China, Kunming Spring City Golf & Lake Resort is ranked as the No.1 Golf Course, offering a golfing experience that capitalizes on the existing features of the property while taking advantage of the dramatic view changes in elevation and expansive nature of the site.
providing travelers both the 4 best golf courses in Kunming as well as other top recommended golf courses in Yunnan Province and start planning your golf trip!

credential.text: This18-hole, 7217 yards, pars 72, golf course was designed by Robert Trent Jones Jr.
One of the top 5 golf courses in Kunming.
In 2007, Sunshine Golf Club won “best golf award” if Golf Digest.
In 2009, it won “the Sixth Best Course in China” by Golf Master.

theCourse.text: First 9 holes are easy. Second 9 holes are challenging. Hole 14 is unforegttable and exciitng
The 14th hole is unforgettable and exciting.
The course preserves the topography of the natural landscape, and surrounding woody hills
The rocks, jungles, pinewood and lakes, are natural barriers, challenging and fun.
It also has  4 man-made lakes, 59 bunkers and 40 bay lighted driving range.
Excellent condition and favorable climate to golf and relax with family or business friend

address.text: Kunming-Qujing Highway 6 km, Beicheng District, Kunming.
Qukun Highway, Panlong District, Kunming City
About 16 Km (14 min) from Kunming Downtown (昆明市盘龙区昆曲高速公路6公里
